alert.note: Alert for Barton; Cedar; Dade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 1:31PM CDT until April 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Western Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing up hail up to the size of Golf balls. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Stockton State Park, Lamar, Stockton, Greenfield, Golden City, Jerico Springs, Lamar Heights, Irwin, Arcola, Umber View Heights, Milford, Caplinger Mills, Wagoner, Kenoma, Neola, Cedarville, Sylvania and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 63 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
